title: War In The Pacific National Historical Park: Mt. Alifan Unit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Mt. Alifan Unit              Mt. Alifan Unit       The Mt. Alifan Unit, site of a former Japanese command post, contains the remains of bomb craters, fox holes, and trenches. The slopes of these hills saw intense battles between United States Marines and the defending Japanese forces. This area is undeveloped, making access difficult.
